Question & Options:
In the context of the production process, which of the following aspects were involved in the making of the 2003 movie 'From Justin to Kelly'?
Options:
A. Actor readings and script revisions
B. Rehearsals for dances and singing
C. A six-week shooting schedule
D. All of the above

In the 2003 movie 'From Justin to Kelly', what is the relationship of R. J. Helton to the production process?
Options:
A. He was the director
B. He was a lead actor
C. He visited the set but did not appear in the final cut
D. He was the screenwriter
Correct Answer: He visited the set but did not appear in the final cut
